segments.text: I see the boy stretching his arm, almost defying gravity to reach the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something both amusing and alarming about his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little face lights up as he spots the cookies inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the instability of the stool beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and hurt himself—or worse, knock over the woman standing by.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a twinge of sadness for the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn’t have to sneak around to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hand is outstretched, full of anticipation, yet so vulnerable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how carefree their laughter could be if only someone noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR
